name: Flame Swap
description:
An fast-paced game where you frantically switch to your fire state and collect falling balls!

AD/Arrow Keys to move

  • Green balls can be collected in any state and increase your score
  • Purple balls can only be collected in your normal state and increase your score
  • Orange balls can only be collected in your fire state and increase your score
  • Gray balls can be collected in any state and decrease your score
